com.simsilica.lemur

Interface RangedValueModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    VersionedObject<java.lang.Double>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRangedValueModel

    public interface RangedValueModel
extends VersionedObject<java.lang.Double>
    Represents a settable value between a certain minimum and maximum range. The value can be retrieved in original units or as a percentage of the delta between min and max. Value versioning is provided for low-overhead external monitoring of the value.
